subject: Dear ,
body:
Dear ,
This is to inform you that we have sent your first payment of $5,000.00 (Five
Thousand dollars) through Western Union as we have been given the mandate to
transfer your full compensation fund of $3,000,000.00 (Three Million US
Dollars Dollars) via Western Union by the United Nations Government.I called
to give you the information through phone but we could not reach you even
this morning. So,I was instructed to email you the payment information which
include MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) and sender's name, so that you
can pick up your payment of $5,000.00 to enable us to send another payment of
$5,000.00 by tomorrow as you know we shall be sending you only $5,000.00 per
day. Please copy this payment information below and go to any Western Union
office/outlet closer to you to receive this payment of $5,000.00 and get back
to us to send you another payment by tomorrow.
Sender First Name: shabbir
Sender Second Name: neemachwala
MTCN: 8238065833
Question= What Color
Answer= White
Amount Sent: $5000
Call this office as soon as you collect this payment from any Western Union money transfer close to you to collect the money.
Best Regards.
Mr. william Lee
+1(812)545-7129  
1978willamlee@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Dear ,
body:
Hello Mr. William Lee,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about this payment! I must say, it's not every day that one receives such news.

I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify a few things for me? You mentioned an MTCN Money Transfer Control Number and sender's name, but I don't see them in the email. Could you provide those details?

Also, you mentioned something about a question "What Color" with an answer "White". What does this mean exactly?

Lastly, could you tell me more about how this came to be? How was my name selected by the United Nations for this fund transfer?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lee

subject: Re: Dear ,
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details?

Best wishes,
Lee
